channel.title: References on simsite
channel.description: Recent content in References on simsite

item.title: Method Overview
item.description: Here, we show all of collected simulation methods, their basic information and the links of usage documentation. We hope it will help you to learn the usage of the method that satisfies your simulation requirements and benefit for your research. The Table of Simulation Methods ID Method Vignette Language URL DOI Journal 1 BASiCS link PLoS Computational Biology 2 BEARscc link Nature Communications 3 CancerInSilico link PLoS Computational Biology 4 dropsim link 5 dyngen link Nature Communications 6 dyntoy link 7 ESCO link Bioinformatics 8 ESCO-traj link Bioinformatics 9 ESCO-tree link Bioinformatics 10 hierarchicell link BMC Genomics 11 Kersplat link Genome Biology 12 Lun link Genome Biology 13 Lun2 link Genome Biology 14 MFA link Wellcome Open Research 15 muscat link Nature Communications 16 phenopath link bioRxiv 17 POWSC link Bioinformatics 18 powsimR link Bioinformatics 19 PROSSTT link Bioinformatics 20 scDD link Genome Biology 21 scDesign link Bioinformatics 22 scDesign2 link Genome Biology 23 scDesign3 link Nature Biotechnology 24 scDesign3-tree link Nature Biotechnology 25 scGAN link Nature Communications 26 scMultiSim link bioRxiv 27 scMultiSim-tree link bioRxiv 28 SCRIP-BGP-commonBCV link Bioinformatics 29 SCRIP-BGP-trendedBCV link Bioinformatics 30 SCRIP-BP link Bioinformatics 31 SCRIP-GP-commonBCV link Bioinformatics 32 SCRIP-GP-trendedBCV link Bioinformatics 33 SCRIP-paths link Bioinformatics 34 SimBPDD link Annales Mathematicae et Informaticae 35 Simple link Genome Biology 36 SparseDC link Nucleic Acids Research 37 SPARSim link Bioinformatics 38 Splat link Genome Biology 39 Splat-paths link Genome Biology 40 SplatPop link Genome Biology 41 SplatPop-paths link Genome Biology 42 SPsimSeq link Bioinformatics 43 SRTsim link Genome Bilogy 44 SymSim link Nature Communications 45 TedSim link Nucleic Acids Research 46 VeloSim link bioRxiv 47 zinbwave link Nature Communications 48 zinbwaveZinger link Genome Biology 49 zingeR link Genome Biology
